name: Tracing Decay
description:
Tracing Decay is an online art museum with multiple galleries featuring artworks from the selected world renown artists:
Barbara Graf 's Anatomical Bodies
Huda Lutfi's Dreams
Daniel Reidy's Collateral Agendas
Daniel Reidy featuring Greg Pond in Piano Burial

Browse their featured paintings and sculptures in a curated environment that contrasts their work and tells the story that links their work together.
Find the hidden videos by the artists, enjoy the art work, and experience it in your own way - find your own story out of it.

The selected art works have been scanned and recreated to a photorealistic quality for the work to be enjoyed as if you're standing in front of it in real life.

Visit our website for more information on the artists and their work.
